heading: Chennai - Yercaud Hill Station Weekend Tour

itinerary.day1Overview: Morning pick-up from advised location/Airport in Chennai & drive to Yercaud. Check into the hotel. Evening free for leisure or relaxation. Overnight stay.

itinerary.day2Overview: Morning at leisure. After breakfast, enjoy a full-day sightseeing tour of Yercaud. Visit Emerald Lake, Botanical Garden, Kiliyur Falls, Lady's Seat, Pagoda Point, Shevaroy Temple, Local Town, Anna Park, Arthur's Seat, Silk Farm, Rose Garden, Bear's Cave & Bear's Hill, etc. Don't miss the boat riding at Yercaud Boathouse to experience the scenic beauty of the hilly terrain. You can also try dirt biking close to Grange Resorts (around 4 kms from the lake). Return to the hotel in the evening for overnight stay.

itinerary.day3Overview: Morning at leisure. After breakfast, free time for relaxation. Afternoon drive back to Chennai. On arrival in Chennai, transfer to the advised location or Airport for your onward journey.

overView.heading: Chennai: Gateway to South India
overView.text: Discover Chennai, a vibrant gateway to South India, renowned for its rich history, bustling markets, and ornate temples. Immerse yourself in the city's cultural tapestry, from traditional Carnatic music to savory South Indian cuisine.

overView.heading: Exploring Kanchipuram's Temple Heritage
overView.text: Embark on a temple tour of Kanchipuram, the 'city of thousand temples'. Visit ancient marvels like Kailasanatha Temple and Vaikunta Perumal Temple, showcasing exquisite Dravidian architecture and intricate sculptures.

overView.heading: Sightseeing in Kanchipuram
overView.text: Unveil Kanchipuram's rich heritage with visits to Varadaraja Temple, Kamakshi Amman Temple, and the hilltop Lord Subramanya Temple at Tiruttani. Delve into religious significance and architectural splendor amidst serene surroundings.

overView.heading: Culinary Delights of South India
overView.text: Indulge in South India's culinary delights, from flavorful dosas and idlis to aromatic filter coffee. Experience the region's gastronomic diversity, blending spices and flavors that define Tamil Nadu's culinary heritage.

overView.heading: Tranquil Retreat in Kanchipuram
overView.text: Experience tranquility in Kanchipuram's serene ambiance. Relax amid lush landscapes and historic temples, soaking in the spiritual essence of this sacred city. Kanchipuram offers a peaceful escape from urban life.

overView.heading: Chennai-Kanchipuram Weekend Escape
overView.text: Plan your weekend escape from Chennai to Kanchipuram, combining cultural exploration with spiritual rejuvenation. Immerse yourself in South India's charm, from temple treasures to culinary delights, creating lasting memories of this enriching journey.

overView.heading: Adventures in Mamallapuram
overView.text: Extend your journey to Mamallapuram, a coastal town famous for its ancient rock-cut temples and shore temples. Explore architectural wonders like the Shore Temple and marvel at the intricately carved sculptures depicting tales of Hindu mythology.
